doc:
Tsuru Aoki https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsuru_Aoki 0 Tsuru Aoki (青木 鶴子, Aoki Tsuruko, September 9, 1892 – October 18, 1961) was a popular Japanese stage and screen actress whose career was most prolific during the silent film era of the 1910s through the 1920s. Aoki may have been the first Asian actress to garner top-billing in American motion pictures. Tsuru_Aoki ( 青木_鶴子 , Aoki_Tsuruko , September_9_,_1892 – October_18_,_1961 ) was a_popular_Japanese_stage_and_screen_actress whose_career was most_prolific during the_silent_film_era of the_1910s through the_1920s . Aoki may_have_been the_first_Asian_actress to_garner top-billing in American_motion_pictures .
